question: What does the blindfolded Lady Justice symbolize?
possible_answers: A. Blind to all considerations other than facts
B. The government must respect all of the legal rights a person is entitled to under the law.
C. Our judicial system is founded on the presumption of innocence in criminal matters.
main_question: What does the blindfolded Lady Justice symbolize?
answer: A. Blind to all considerations other than facts
explanatory_sentence: The blindfolded Lady Justice symbolizes the impartial manner in which our laws are administered: blind to all considerations but the facts.
